    • About Joe Mendoza


    Joe Mendoza has been involved in real estate for over 20 years. He has been a Real Estate Broker, Investor, Consultant, Advisor, Mentor, Managing Partner, Acquisitions Manager, and a Nationwide Coach. At present, he is President of the Joe Mendoza Team, Inc. San Diego, California. Mr. Mendoza also is an Executive Real Estate and Business Coach for Tom Ferry Your Coach, based in Newport Beach, CA.

    Mr. Mendoza has a long track record of success. While at Prudential California Realty, he ranked as high as the Top 1% in the nation and was number 7 in all of San Diego County. He built a team of 2 full-time employees and 5 licensed associate agents.
